title: A Semi-Comprehensive List of Foundation Fronts
content:
[[div style="display: none"]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:flopstyle-dark]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="lite-heading"]]
----
+* A Semi-Comprehensive List of Foundation Fronts
[[div class="pseudocrumbs"]]
[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-fronts|SCP Fronts]]] >> A Semi-Comprehensive List of Foundation Fronts
[[/div]]
----
[[/div]]

[[>]]
[[module rate]]
[[/>]]

[[div class="darkbox"]]
[[=]]
++++ NOTE

This is meant to be used as a resource, not as a 'canonical' list of all of the fronts the Foundation uses. Please do not pester authors for 'using them wrong' or anything of the sort.
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="darkbox"]]

The Foundation has worn several disguises in order to protect itself from the public eye. From construction firms to pharmaceutical companies to universities, there is no front organization too big or too small for the Foundation to conceal itself behind in the name of its mission of containment. Some are used once and then disposed of, some have multiple use cases and are resurrected as needed, and others have been in continuous use for over a century.

Several of these fronts have a further layer of protection in the form of [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/pickman-blank-proposal The Frontispiece], a memetic aegis which prevents most people from linking the SCP Acronym back to the Foundation, but this isn't always the case.

In general, Fronts fall into a few different categories:
* **Academic/Educational:** Think-tanks, schools, universities, or collections of academics.
* **Agricultural:** Front organization operates as a farm or food manufacturer.
* **Commercial:** Businesses that do not involve manufacturing materials.
* **Custodial:** Cleaning services, both euphemistically and otherwise.
* **Entertainment:** Film studios, website curation, content creation.
* **Food Service:** The front also serves as a restaurant.
* **Industrial:** The front is a manufacturing, construction, or utility company.
* **Medical/Pharmaceutical:** The front is a medical facility such as a hospital, or a pharma research company.
* **Military/Security:** The front is a security force or military contractor. This includes aviation and space contractors.
* **Philanthropic:** The front is concealed behind an organization such as a charity or relief organization.
* **Real Estate:** The front is a real estate company, or owns several pieces of it.
* **Retail:** Front is a retail store.
* **Settlement:** The front takes the form of an entire human settlement, such as a village.
* **Unclear:** The nature of the front isn't 100% obvious in the documentation.

[[/div]]

[[div class="darkbox"]]
++ How to contribute
-----
Consider which of the categories the front you wish to add to this list belongs to. 

Does it use the initials S.C.P. anywhere in its name? Then it goes in the __**Frontispiece**__ section. If not, __**Non-Frontispiece**__ is where it goes.

Is it an Academic front, a Military/Security front, etc.? Please put it in the appropriate sub-category, or in the "Unclear" section if you're not sure how to categorize it.

These lists operate in alphabetical order. Please make sure to put the front you found in the correct position on the list.

Please add entries using this template:

[[code]]
|| {{FRONT NAME}} || {{FRONT DESCRIPTION}} || {{FRONT CATEGORY}} || {{ARTICLES FRONT APPEARED IN}} ||
[[/code]]

[[/div]]
[[=]]
__**Frontispiece:**__
[[/=]]

[[collapsible show="Show" hide ="Hide"]]

|| AquaS Conservancy for Penguins || Front group for the containment of anomalies of the //Spheniscidae// family of birds (commonly known as penguins). || Philanthropic ||[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-2720 SCP-2720] [[[SCP-6458]]] ||
|| Lake Huron Supply, Control & Purification|| A water distillation and purification company. Front company for Site-43, which supplies clean water to the First Peoples in Nx-94. || Industrial ||[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-5494 SCP-5494], [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/secure-facility-dossier-site-43 Secure Facility Dossier: Site-43] ||
|| Public Corporate Society || An organization used for dealing with both anomalous and non-anomalous corporate activity. || Commercial ||[[[SCP-4985]]] ||
|| Safe and Clean Planet Initiative || Conservation group operating in central Africa.|| Philanthropic|| [[[SCP-1265]]] ||
|| Safe Contour Therapy Practitioners || Therapy organization used to condition civilian witnesses to the anomalous into disbelieving events they have witnessed. || Philanthropic|| [[[SCP-5954]]] ||
|| Safety Consultancy of Palatine || Non-profit relief organization that investigates unexplained disasters. || Philanthropic || [[[SCP-8922]]] ||
|| Sakura's Celebrations and Parades || Company responsible for organizing festivals and parades within  Fukoka Prefecture, Japan; part of containment efforts on SCP-5406, alongside  Solutions for Contaminative Petroleum Project || Entertainment || [[[SCP-5406]]] ||
|| Salk & Cooper Pharmaceuticals|| Foundation front company that carries out testing on individuals with anomalous infections in the nexus of Harkness, Maryland|| Medical/Pharmaceutical || [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/an-apple-a-day An Apple A Day...]||
|| Salmonov Controls Production || A front company for the building that houses the Foundation's Disinformation Bureau. || Commercial || [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/personnel-file-lyusternik-lazar|PERSONNEL FILE Lyusternik, Lazar]]] ||
|| Sam's Canadian Pub || Local food and drinks establishment in Grand Bend, Ontario, near Site-43. || Food Service || [[[SCP-7000]]], [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/34-the-cruelest-fight|The Cruelest Fight]]] ||
|| Sam's Child Protection || Front company that purchased the remnants of SCP-5230-1, to be converted into a new orphanage. || Philanthropic || [[[SCP-5230]]] ||
|| Sam's Cleanliness Provider || A front company which members of Mobile Task Force Theta-10 ("Deep In The Heart") nominally work for. || Custodial ||[[[SCP-5642]]] ||
|| Samson Chemical & Petroleum || A front company used as a scapegoat for any damage caused by SCP-2489. || Industrial || [[[SCP-2489]]] ||
|| Samson & Clarke Properties || A real estate company owned by the Foundation.|| Real Estate || [[[SCP-7620]]] ||
|| Samson and Cooper Pharmaceuticals || A shell company under Soy-Corn Produce. || Medical/Pharmaceutical || [[[Excerpts from Training Seminars for Lesser Known Foundation Careers]]] ||
|| Samson-Coulscott Properties || A real-estate company owned by the Foundation, operating in Europe.|| Real Estate|| [[[SCP-6243]]] ||
|| Samson-Craig Products || No Description Available || Unclear ||[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/log-of-extranormal-events Log of Extranormal Events Vol. 1]||
|| Samuel Chris Parker || Fictional individual that bails out Foundation personnel that have been accidentally imprisoned.|| Unclear || [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/new-jersey-state-police-case-102-9381-23 New Jersey State Police: Case 102-9381-23] ||
|| Sandford Chemical Processing || Front company located near Site-73; handles amnestic dispersal and creating cover stories for containment breaches. || Industrial ||[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/dr-robinsons-statement Dr. Robinson's Statement]||
|| Saratoga Carnegie/Pierce University || Foundation-run University which occasionally recruits researchers straight from its PhD program. || Academic/Educational ||[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/welcome-to-delta-t| Temporal Site-01 (RCT-Î”t Hub)]]] |||
|| Sasha's Cleaning Products || Front company for Armed Site-21 || Custodial ||[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/security-camera-footage Security Camera Footage], [[[SCP-7043]]] ||
|| Saskatoon Coal Processing || A Foundation front composed of civilian shipping vessels on the Great Lakes. || Commercial || [[[SCP-7578]]] ||
|| Sawyer's Cheesy Pretzels|| Bakery that serves soft pretzels with a variety of high-quality cheeses; used as intelligence-gathering centers and launching points for task force operations. || Food Service ||[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/pickman-blank-proposal Pickman-Blank Proposal]||
|| Schaefer Construction PLC || Foundation front company which contains condemned buildings with anomalous properties.|| Industrial || [[[SCP-3588]]] ||
|| Schmidt and Corper Plating || Front organization dating to the 1930s, used by Site-44 to supply materials for the study of SCP-6730 instances.|| Industrial || [[[SCP-6730]]] ||
|| Science-Centered Progress || Consulting Firm and academic journal that works as a Front for reintegrating -EX SCPs back into society. || Academic || [[[Reporting on the Front]]] ||
|| Scientific Curiosity Products || Philanthropic organization, organizes presentations for students of elementary school age.|| Academic/Educational|| [[[SCP-5233]]] ||
|| SecureCorp Professionals || A Mobile Task Force, disguising as a private security firm, dedicated to destroying footage of or interfering with SCP-1110 manifestations. || Security || [[[SCP-1110]]] ||
|| Sconces, Candelabras, and Photography || A chain of Foundation-run electrical and lighting supply stores.|| Retail || [[[SCP-4656]]] ||
|| Scout's Cargo Packing || Deprecated front organization, used for transporting supplies and personnel between Foundation sites during the Panopticon Crisis.|| Commercial (Defunct)||[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/pickman-blank-proposal Pickman-Blank Proposal] ||

[[module CSS]]
 :root {
    --accentColor: hsl(195, 81%, 51%);
    --accentColorLite: hsla(195, 81%, 61%, .5);
    --hue: 195deg;
    --lgurl: url(https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/component:pride-highlighter/tg_logo_blk.svg);

    --header-subtitle: "SHIELD - CONCEAL - PLANT";
}

 #extra-div-1 {
    filter: opacity(.2);
}

 #page-content table.wiki-content-table {
    margin: 0 auto;
}

 #page-content table.wiki-content-table tr td {
    border-color: var(--accentColorLite);
}

 #page-content table.wiki-content-table tr td:nth-child(1) {
    font-size: 1.05rem;
    font-weight: bold;
    text-align: center;
}

 #page-content div table {
    overflow-x: auto;
}

 .modal {
    margin: 1rem 0;

    color: var(--textColorMid);
    background: var(--fgColor);
    border: 7px solid var(--accentColorLite);
}

 .modal .collapsible-block-folded,
 .modal .collapsible-block-unfolded-link {
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding: 1.6rem;
}

 @media (min-width: 768px) {
     #main-content {
     max-width: 75%;
    }

     .modal .collapsible-block-link {
     font-size: 1.55rem;
    }
}
[[/module]]
author: Ihp
